welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wood River, the charming city known for its scenic views and outdoor adventures. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Alton Airport caters to executive and luxury travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for executive and private flights at St. Louis Downtown Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
